_comment: This json configuration file specifies all layers associated with the bitcoin
dataset, organized hierarchically according to two things: primarily, ability
to go on the same map, and secondarily, by interest to the user.  This means
that if two layers can go on the same map, using the same axes, they should fall
under the same node in the hierarchy, and that the axes should be noted on the
joint parent node under which they both fall.  However, as long as layers that
can and should share a map are so grouped, any further organization is completely
open, and should be used simply to present the layers to the user in a way that
makes sense.
Leaf nodes should all specify actual layers that can be displayed on a map, and
all layers that can be so displayed should be leaf nodes.  Non-leaf nodes exist
solely to organize and group layers as described above.
Axis configuration is transitive downward - meaning that if axes are specified on
a given node in the hierarchy, they also apply to all children of that node.
Axis configurations should be specified so that exactly one applies to each leaf
node.  An axis configuration is specified under an 'axes' node, and should contain
a xAxisConfig and yAxisConfig keys.  Each axis can each have the following keys:
title:      axis label text                     ex. Longitude
id:         axis identifier                     ex. map-x-axis or map-y-axis
min:        minimum axis value
max:        maximum axis value
intervalSpec:
type:   type of interval                    ex. fixed or percentage
value:  fixed / percentage increment of the axis
ex. 10
pivot:  the fixed value / percentage that all other values are incremented from
ex. 0
allowScaleByZoom: if the axis should be scaled by the zoom factor
ex. false
isMercatorProjected: whether or not to project value by mercator projection
ex. true
unitSpec:
type:       type of units parse in FormatAxis.js
ex.degrees, time, decimal, B, M, K
decimals:   number of decimals              ex. 2
allowStepDown: if the units can step down if they are below range
ex. true .001M => 1K
repeat:     whether or not the axis will repeat
ex. true or false
position:       where to place the axis         ex. left, right, top, bottom
majorMarkerLength:  the length of the major marker tick mark
ex. 10
majorMarkerWidth:   the width of the major marker tick mark
ex. 1
majorMarkerColour:  the color of the major marker tick mark
ex. #7E7E7E
markerLabelColour: the color of the major marker label
ex. #7E7E7E
axisLabelColour:   the color of the axis label
ex. #7E7E7E
fontFamily:         the font family to use for labels
ex. Tahoma, Verdana, Segoe, sans-serif
markerLabelFontSize: the font size of the marker label
ex. 0.75em
axisLabelFontSize:   the font size of the axis label
ex. 0.95em
